description: The response to a request for Order status information.
title: orderStatusResponse

___projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

___expectedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller expects to complete the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___completionDate.description: Identifies the date the Seller completed the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___correctionOrderExpected.description: If true, the Buyer is expected to send a corrective (supplemental) order as a replacement order.

___orderMessages.description: An array of messages associated with this Order.

$eref.description: Details of a message for an Order.
$eref.title: orderMessage

___field.description: The field / attribute on the Order associated with the Message.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference to the item on the Order to which this notification applies.

___correctionRequired.description: Indicates whether the Buyer must submit an updated Order to resolve the error/jeopardy condition.

___messageInformation.description: A description of the error condition or information to be conveyed to the Buyer.

___code.description: The code associated with this Message.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderMessage.

___buyerOrderVersion.description: The version number that the Buyer uses to refer to this particular version of the order.

___orderId.description: Unique identifier for the order that is generated by the Seller when the order is initially accepted via an API.

___orderItemStatuses.description: An optional array that allows the Seller to provide status on each Order Item.

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to this order item.

___sellerId.description: The ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the order.

___requestedCompletionDate.description: Identifies the customer's requested completion date for the Order. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___buyerId.description: The ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the order.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderStatusResponse.

___buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies a order within the buyer's enterprise.

___correctionOrderDueDate.description: Date by which the corrected/amended order must be sent to the Seller to ensure that the order is not CANCELLED. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).
